review_text: Awesome spot!

Me and my family stayed at the Dillon house for a little weekend get away and it was absolutely beautiful! I got to live out my Victorian Era dreams and did not want to leave.
My kids also loved it and played for hours on the swing out front and spent a lot of time watching deer in the backyard. Would 100% stay again!

The house is very comfortable and an unique historical experience. The attention to details throughout the house is amazing from plenty of items in the kitchen to all of the amenities make for a wonderful stay.
The hosts were very responsive to any and all questions. We would highly recommend staying here.

My family loved our stay at Dillon House! The space is huge and beautifully decorated. The host was helpful and very responsive to questions. It was definitely worth it to splurge for this charming house!

My family of 7 enjoyed our time at Dillon House immensely! We enjoyed reading about the home's rich and carefully preserved history and finding old pictures displayed around the house. The decor, of course, is fabulous, just like the pictures, but is also comfortable and very functional. We felt right at home! And the hosts are very friendly, responsive, and helpful. I cannot say enough good things and we would definitely return!

Our stay at this Victorian home was nothing short of enchanting. From the moment we stepped through the door, an ambiance of timeless elegance greeted us. My husband, who has a keen eye for architecture, remarked that this was the most exquisite Victorian home he has ever seen – and considering his experience, that's saying something!
The attention to detail throughout the home was truly exceptional. Every corner revealed another delightful surprise, whether it was the intricate woodwork, the ornate fixtures, or the tasteful furnishings. It was evident that every element had been carefully curated to evoke the charm of a bygone era while still offering modern comforts.
We found ourselves enchanted by the peaceful surroundings, and the proximity to President Hayes's house and museum only added to the allure of the area.
Overall, our experience surpassed all expectations. To anyone seeking a truly memorable stay in a picturesque setting, I wholeheartedly recommend this Victorian Gem!
Beyond our expectations! Elegant, lovely, clean, historical and comfortable too! Fabulous hosts! We will be back! Most grateful for the outstanding experience!
Beautiful house! We had an amazing stay

Better than the pictures. This home has been curated with an eye for the artful and unique. The character and charm of this home cannot be overstated. I would recommend the Dillon to anyone without hesitation.
Perfect place for a business stay if in town. Highly recommended!
Beautiful historic home!!! Very peaceful. Will stay there again!

The house was beautiful! Not only that but the hosts were so helpful! They communicated with me whenever I had questions almost immediately. There was so much history in the home and it was literally like going on an adventure. I wish the weather could have been better so we could have gone outside to enjoy the patio and porch but sometimes Mother Nature is just not on your side. I would recommend this place to my peers.
Great place, matched the pictures and description.
Nice place but family coming out of town were freaked out by the animal heads in the bedrooms and opted to sleep elsewhere.

This home was absolutely beautiful! The time and attention to detail Michael & Aaron have put into this home is awe inspiring. The home was well stocked and we felt right at home. The worst part of our stay was having to leave.

We loved every minute in this gorgeous historical home. Everything was exactly as pictured and even better than we imagined. The home was so clean and tidy and full of wonderful nooks and crannies for enjoying the history of the home.
Thank you for making us feel so welcome. We can’t wait to return!

We live in Fremont and have always admired this house. When family came from out of town we stayed here and it did not disappoint . It is so full of history and everything about it made for amazing family time . We will definitely do this again.

If you are even remotely considering staying at the Dillon House, do it!! It is absolutely stunning, especially if you like historic homes. My family asked if we could just buy it and move in! The house is huge with enough room for a large group. The kitchen is stocked with anything you could possibly need. The bedrooms are comfortable and quiet. The whole space is extremely clean. The neighborhood is adorable with a park directly across the street. The outdoor space is also beautiful. We had a baby deer visit! The home is about a 30 minute drive to Port Clinton and that general area but it's a nice drive. We go to Lake Erie every summer and have always stayed there but this is our new go to from now on.

I could not have been happier than staying at Mike and Aaron's Dillion House. It had the charm of an old Victorian home with modern amenities like A/C and updated bathrooms. They were also extremely responsive and accommodating for every request I had. I highly recommend you stay there if are ever in Fremont!!

This beautiful home is perfect for family gatherings. We planned a day at Cedar Point (only a 45 minute drive) and the remainder of the 3 days we spent at the Dillon House. The outside porches, garden area, and fire pit were perfect depending on the time of the day. It was a great adventure just admiring all the decor in the home. The kitchen was well stocked with dishes (we didn’t cook any meals), but ate lots of take out food. The beds were very comfortable and the the bathrooms were also well stocked. The quiet evenings on the porch were so relaxing and even had deer visit the front yard. We highly recommend the Historic Dillon House.

The home is a true gem from the Victorian era. It’s is conveniently located directly across from the Hayes Presidential Home and Museum in a lovely neighborhood. Michael and Aaron are definitely Super Hosts!
Wonderful historic home. Lots of space for the 7 adults in our family. We loved sitting on the front porch for coffee in the morning and cocktails in the evening.
Beautiful historic home with a lot of cool items in the house and located near the Hayes Memorial. Well kept and very responsive hosts. We had a nice weekend here!

Mike and Aaron's house was amazing as were the hosts! Our Family was so excited that our hosts opened up their home for us to enjoy! This house is located in a beautiful neighborhood of historic houses with expansive yards and trees. The house had beautiful period furniture and very comfortable bedrooms. The whole house was very clean and well stocked including the kitchen. It was fun to explore and just relax. We felt right at home. We enjoyed walking across the street to the Hayes Presidential Library and Museum and walking through Spiegel Grove. Thank you. We will be back!
Such a beautiful unique home. My team loved it!

The Dillion house was amazing, again. We loved the history of and across the street of the house. Beautiful inside and out. Easy to get to and amazing instructions to get inside. Thank you again for the stay. Beautiful home

This property is stunning. We had ample room for our family of 5. We were brought to historic Fremont for a wedding. We would definitely stay here again if we are in the area.
We were delighted with the treats they left for us when we arrived.
Their communication was friendly and prompt.
The plants are lush and homey. The grounds are spectacular. I wish we would of had more time to enjoy the many sitting places both inside and out.
Feel honored to have stayed in such a beautiful piece of history.

Such a gorgeous home, we all had a blast! House was impeccable, easy check in and check out. Nice outdoor space to hang out. Great location, while there we visited Ottawa National Wildlife Preserve. Checked out Seneca Caverns, cool cave tour. Castalia Quarry Metropark was a great hike to check out. Also kayaked at Ghoul Runnings, be sure to do the Haunted Hydro Tour as well there. Close to many restaurants and bars, we got to go from Jimmy G's BBQ and ate in at The Garrison, both were excellent. What a gem Fremont is!

Spent the weekend living in history! We felt right at home at Michael & Aaron’s historic home. No need for a tv when you can stroll through the house and take in the history and decor.
It’s very walkable. Our family walked the Hayes center and Birchard park.
Love the details - if you want to step back into history for a weekend - stay here!!

Micheal & Aaron's home is spectacular. This was by far the most unique home we have stayed in. The tempature in the house was perfect, the beds were comfortable, the kitchen was well stocked. We loved the stove and the sink! They are very curtious hosts with exceptional communication. We had coffee on the front porch and started planning our next visit. Thank you guys!

Awesome Victorian house, so much history and yet comfortable. Each bedroom has a unique personality. Kitchen is amazing, so welcoming with everything you need and then more. Comfortable outside area great for relaxing.

This place is amazing!!! The property is like other. I highly recommended staying here. In fact, we immediately booked another stay 15 min after our arrival. Michael & Aaron we’re incredibly friendly, helpful, & responsive. There is no doubt they know what they’re doing!!

It’s hard to say enough great things about this historic and utterly gorgeous house. Michael Ray and Aaron were perfect hosts and the Dillon House exceeded our expectations at every single turn. It’s an amazing house and an incredible value. Five stars across-the-board!
Great people

Historic charmer within walking distance to the Hayes Presidential Home. This is a beautifully preserved historic home has all the amenities you could ask for. There’s ample bedroom space for 8 adults and plenty of room downstairs for your group to enjoy one another’s company. The location is just about a mile from downtown and restaurants.

What an amazing weekend!!!
It was like staying in an ISpy book!
I could have stayed a WEEK and not seen everything!
The home is beautiful! Spacious! Inviting! And PERFECT for a couples weekend getaway!
Such an amazing experience!!
Awesome grounds! Great location!

We absolutely loved staying at the house. It was perfect for our purposes. Our immediate (small) family was in town, sadly, for a funeral, and webwere able to be in one place all together during a difficult time. The full kitchen was a blessing, the house itself a point of entertainment and discovery for hours on end. We thoroughly enjoyed our visit at your beautiful home. The check-in process was flawless and we had no issues whatsoever. It was a blessing to have such a great experience when we had to focus on so many other details of a weekend filled with many events that required our attention. We definitely recommend to others. Thank you so much!!

The Dillon House was an absolutely perfect stay. It has all the modern amenities that we look for when traveling while maintaining all of its historic charm with many era appropriate furniture pieces, antiques, and architectural features. The garden and seating areas around the home were a nice and unexpected touch. Hosts were responsive and helpful. Check in and checkout were quick and simple. Thank you!
Loved the stay here, beautiful home!
What a great home! We felt like we were in a museum. There was so much to look at. The neighborhood is very safe and quiet. Thank you for making your wonderful home available.
Such detail, beauty and history! The home provided a perfect place for our families to get away and enjoy the area. You won’t regret booking this home.
The house was beautiful, clean, and so well equipped with everything we needed for an awesome trip
Absolutely beautiful home it’s huge plenty of room ,beautiful yard home was amazing and equipped with everything you need!! Loved it!

What a grand place to be for the Fourth of July. There was a concert at Spiegel Grove on Rutherford Hayes veranda that we listened to on the front porch. We found the home perfect for our extended family of 10. Clean and very spacious. Loaded with many things to look at and talk about. Many memories made here.
The house was amazing and the property was gorgeous! Communication was great and check in and out was easy. Would highly recommend this house to anyone and plan to stay again.
Incredible house! Fully stocked kitchen was a huge plus. Super clean. Quiet area. EV fast charging within walking distance.
We LOVED our stay and would recommend it unequivocally.
Beautiful house.

Oh my goodness! That was my first reaction upon entering this stately home. The home was built in the 1920 's and is full of exquisit wordwork and architecture. The owners have updated the home to tastfully blend in with the ambiance of days gone by. Michael and Christopher have clearly spent countless hours in collecting a vast variety of antiques and collectibles that fill the home. If you have a love and appreciation for antiques, you will LOVE this home. The grounds that surround the home are beautiful as well. My family felt like royalty staying at the Dillon House.

Such a cool place to stay! There’s something fun and fascinating to look at in every corner. As cozy as it is beautiful. Very spacious and clean, extremely easy to feel at home in. Definitely want to return for another trip!
Amazing house! Wonderful stay

Beautiful late 1800s craftsmanship. Ever tried hanging a door at home? What about using 1890s tools and hanging a 300# door on three hinges perfectly so it glides smoothly for the next 120 years. And if memory serves there are about a dozen on the first floor. Even the flathead screws holding them up are all in alignment.
Enjoy the decorations, the pictures and imagine haven lived in this home. Granted, there are modern amenities, microwave, dishwasher, but not in a disruptive way to the vibe of the house.
Take some time to sit in each room and just let your eyes and mind wander.
A great place to stay, everything is clean and tidy. My friends and I were amazed by the style of the house.

Joyce and her husband had awesome hospitality!! My husband and I will definitely stay there again. Joyce and her husband made our first Air B&B stay easy and enjoyable!! Joyce and her husband went above and beyond for my husband and I!! 😃❤️
The room was cozy and clean. Joyce was so friendly and helpful. we enjoyed staying there and highly recommend it.
My oy wish would have been printed out check out instructions. I didn't see the Airbnb message until after we'd left, so we missed the requirements. Very nice people.

Although I didn’t get a chance to stay due to a personal emergency, Joyce was a wonderful host and replied promptly to any questions and I had as well as to see what time I would be arriving. Will definitely book here again when I’m able to swing by!
One of the best host, if I can give them a 6 star rating I would… amazing people.. felt like family
Great host. Peaceful town. Close to wildlife areas. The nearby town has no sidewalks, so not great for walking.

My son and I had a great time. The host was very friendly. My son and I played a few games if pool in their rec room. The bed was one of the most comfortable beds I've slept in in a long time. I would definitely recommend them to anyone.
Joyce was very accommodating on short notice and is one of the nicest people I’ve met. Any trips back to the area I will be staying here.

Joyce and Paul were both Amazing!
If you are apprehensive about staying in a room inside someones home, don’t be. They were polite, helpful and we conversated. They were not to quiet nor overly talkative. Very kind people. I will be staying again in the future.
Great price, great people, great area. Will definitely stay here again if I'm back in the Area.
My second stay here. This time for two nights. Zero problems. Everything great and very smooth. Nice people. Will stay here again.
Joyce is a fantastic host. She and her husband are always friendly and accommodating. The room is quiet and I always get a great nights sleep in the comfortable bed. Highly recommended!
The room was quiet and comfortable. Very happy with my stay. Joyce is so nice and welcoming, highly recommend!
Joyce and Paul were wonderful people. I enjoyed spending time with them.
Thank you.
it was amazing, I feel at home, thank you for your attention and kindness
Wonderful place to stay and wonderful hosts.
They are some of the friendliest people I've ever had the pleasure of speaking to. Great place to stay.

best air b&b ever Paul and Joyce are so great.
had a great time hangout with them on my off time.
down to earth people.
highly recommend this air b&b.

My stay was as advertised. Cozy, clean and comfortable. I was in Town on business . I stayed one night. I will stay here again.
Tom

I cannot say enough about Joyce and Paul’s home! From the moment I came in they offered me help with my bags and were instantly welcoming. They made me feel right at home. Beautiful and very clean home. Also the dogs were great!!

We had a wonderful stay at Joyce's house. We had a long drive and came in late but she and her partner didn't mind at all. We had very interesting conversations and loved staying here. Everything was clean and easy to find. The pictures are telling the truth! Too bad we had a busy schedule otherwise we would have loved spending more time with Joyce!
Peaceful neighborhood.
Great to stay here again!
Amazing home great location. Friendly Host couldn't asked for a better 😍🥰 May God continue to bless them in life I really do appreciate an enjoyed my staying

Joyce and Paul where amazing!!
The most cheerful and adorable couple I’ve ever met! So helpful and refreshing to find a person as heart felt as Joyce to stay with.
As a person from out of the country I felt safe and comfortable at their place. They really made my stay in Ohio special!
If you want a stay in this area look no further! It’s 110% worth it! Clean and comfortable,
Cozy and just an overall good vibes from this house! Hope to see them again :)
Joyce and Paul were very welcoming and made me feel right at home!

Wonderful stay , private room, clean sheets and towels, updated home. Joyce welcomed me in as soon as I pulled up, she is very hospitable, when Joyce was talking to it was like we two friends who reunited after 12 years, I had a issue the roku very late at night and Joyce took care of it. Paul is nice and helpful. The back yard is to hang out. One of the best parts of my stay is that the dogs made friends with me and kept me company. The dogs were either sitting on my lap, at my feet or put their heads on leg, definitely great host🐾. Joyce had plenty of coffee and water for me. There is a hot tub you can use and pool table. If you are allergic to cats or dogs, make sure you bring allergy pills. I had a great stay, I will be back.
Joyce and Paul were amazing hosts. The room and restroom were very clean and they made us feel right at home.
Amazing home away from home. Easily one of the COMFIEST beds I’ve ever slept on. Great location, clean room, nice bathroom. Everything you could want at a very reasonable price. Thank you!!

Joyce and Paul were amazing hosts and very accommodating. Felt right at home from the second we walked in. Hot tub was fantastic, plus a beautiful back porch area with crystal clear skies to see the stars. We stayed here after we had a full day at Cedar Point and had no trouble finding it or checking in. Next time we will have to plan for a little longer stay. Would definitely recommend 😊

Joyce's place was great for a 2 night stay as my friend and I enjoyed some fun outdoor activities by Lake Erie. We used both bedrooms and also used the kitchen to heat up some baked oatmeal . Joyce's home is very clean and beautiful. She is a friendly host and was very helpful with suggestions for local restaurants and activities. We kayaked at East Harbor State Park, took our bikes on the ferry to Kelleys Island, and we hiked at Cuyahoga Valley National Park on our way home. It was a great weekend! I would highly recommend staying with Joyce - I would definitely stay there again!

Perfect place to stay for a weekend Cedar Point getaway.
Was exactly what we needed! Joyce and Paul were the nicest people.

Loved my stay with Paul and Joyce! They were super friendly hosts and very easy to communicate with. Enjoyed that I felt like I had some privacy upstairs in their lovely home. Just a quick trip to Sandusky! Would definitely recommend staying with Paul and Joyce!

Joyce and Paul are great hosts. The house is in a nice area and the neighborhood is very quiet. They have amazingly good pets. Any time I had a question Joyce was on it. Their house is very tidy. They did a wonderful job making me feel like I was at home there. I would go back 1000%.
Just a wonderfully welcoming space that is a great place to rest after a long day of travel. Highly recommend!
It was great having the privacy of second floor. Paul and Joyce are super friendly and accommodating. Would recommend.
Friendly host. Great for a quick stopover.
Perfect for a quick stay.
A really nice stay at the end of a long day of travel. Joyce was very nice and accommodating.
Very nice place, setting and hosts. I would recommend to everyone.
Paul and Joyce were amazing hosts. They do offer outside power and boat parking for out of town anglers. Very clean and cozy accommodations.

I would highly recommend Joyce's home! I was passing through on a road trip and this location was in the perfect spot for a stop. The bed was very comfortable, and I got a great night's sleep. Joyce was so welcoming and hospitable that I felt right at home. She generously made me a delicious, full breakfast, which got me off to a great start on a long day of driving.

Place was amazing, clean house, nice big bathroom, friendly dogs and cats. Even let us play pool. Joyce even cooked us breakfast when she didn’t have too on our last day, full breakfast and everything. Homemade oatmeal, over easy eggs, toast and jam. Really nice overall. Would recommend.

Joyce and Paul were awesome hosts! I stayed here for 3 months with my dog and I felt right at home. The house was always clean, they respected my privacy, and they even treated my dog like one of their own. They made me breakfast, lunch, and dinner occasionally and some nights we would have a couple drinks and just hangout. The location is perfect and I was very surprised to find there’s lots to do in Fremont! There’s cute restaurants, plenty of fast food, a couple of vegetarian juice bars, and a Walmart all within 15 minutes. I definitely recommend staying here!
It was a nice stay. The house had all the essentials you would need.
My family and I had a great and comfortable stay at Jacob's. Everything was new and clean; well stocked kitchen was appreciated. Communication was perfect and check-in was simple.
Excellent stay as always!
Amazing!
Our employee that stayed there really enjoyed his stay thank you!
Nice location with easy access to birding sites on the lake, but without the traffic!

I'm a frequent visitor to this place, and will come back again. Peaceful small town vibe, but close to activities if so interested. Comes complete with a pair of bicycles for riding around town or on the nearby paved bike trail, and a garage for my car! Love this little town; warm and friendly! The house itself is all you might expect of a small town bungalow; warm, comfy, and cozy!

We were at the end of a very long family trip and Cindie’s home was a sanctuary for us - so sweet, so comfortable, so kid-friendly, and she was lovely, reaching out to let us know we could check-in early and setting up the baby crib for us - one less item to unpack! We will absolutely stay here again!!
I was very impressed with this location and the host.
Great place to stay if you’re in the area. Very clean and comfortable.

This was our second extended stay at Lovely Lindsey, and we'd be happy to stay again. Cindie and Mark are great hosts, and the house has lots of space, nice features, and everything we needed. Lindsey is a quiet pleasant community, great for walking around. Recommended!
Excellent as always. This is our 4th visit, I believe. Wonderful small town vibe, with shopping etc. within 10 minutes away.
I thought I'd already done this or something similar - seems like a lot of feedback requests from AirBnB. Multi-time user of the place and will stay there again. What more can I say?
Very clean comfortable place to stay. Attached garage was a nice to have as well. Great stay!

Cindie's place was awesome. Spotless, easy to get into and very welcoming. I had access to everything I needed. Cindie was proactive with communication and directions were great. I'll definitely book again if I'm in the area. Thank you Cindie!
Cindie’s place was very nice. We had everything we needed during our stay. Quite neighborhood too. We will stay here again if ever in the area.
It was a nice stay

Whole house with full kitchen for the same price as hotels in the area. Ideal for my visits to friends and family. Well furnished for activities. Very comfortable bed. I’m a repeat customer. All the comforts of home!!

The accommodations were perfect for the needs of my family.
The short commute to the islands and other attractions was minimal. The price of the rental was extremely reasonable compared to the lodging closer to the lake.
We enjoyed our stay.
Very nice Airbnb for small group. Very cute small town. We would definitely stay there again for our next family reunion.
Was a pleasure to stay at a very relaxing location very quiet. Was a pleasure to get to meet to very friendly host. Would most definitely recommend staying here and hope to be back some day.

Prior to our trip Cindie reached out and had a pack n play set up for us, which was wonderful! The house was very nice and clean, we had to cut our trip short due to a family emergency, left in a hurry and Cindie was very understanding! When we are able to re visit the area we will definitely be booking this house again!!
If I ever come back to the area, I would definitely come back to Cindie’s place. We were happy that it was clean and quiet. The price was definitely worth it.

We enjoyed our stay in Cindie’s clean & comfortable ranch house. It’s in a quiet neighborhood in a small town near I-80. The attached garage (complete with bikes) & her guidebook to places to visit locally were nice features.
Awesome little house
Exactly as described. Clean, quite, comfortable and the neighborhood felt very safe.
Lovely place. Very quiet.

Very clean and comfortable. The home comes with a lot of Amenities that are very helpful like a washer and dryer, a book full of activities to try and places to eat, game room, and a large tv with access to Netflix and stuff 10/10 would recommend staying here in the nice little town
Cozy beautiful home. We’ll definitely return. Very friendly town as well.
My second time there. Will do again. Great set-ups for family activity. Peaceful, quiet neighborhood. Spotlessly clean and well-provisioned. I love this small town.
Great place to stay! My family was very comfortable and the owners were super accommodating. Highly recommend

The house was such a beautiful and peaceful little get away. Not much noise and was very clean and put together when we arrived. Everything listed was provided and the extra playpen for our 11mo old was such an amazing touch! Would highly recommend to anyone looking for a nice, small, quiet getaway.
Cute little home in a quiet neighborhood. Home was as described. Wonderful walking/biking trail close by. Would use again.
We really enjoyed our stay. It was a quiet retreat, easily accessible, loved the garage, and the big TV.
Was exactly as described. Friendly hosts. Very clean. Would recommend this Airbnb.
My husband and I enjoyed our stay here very much.

My husband and I recently had a house fire and needed somewhere to stay, Cindie and her husband have been so helpful and accommodating. They are so nice and friendly. The house is perfect for our stay during this time.

We had a lovely 3 month stay in Lindsey. Cindie and Mark are such friendly and considerate hosts. The house is fully modernized but somehow manages to retain its retro charm. Loved the 65" TV, the bonus game room, and spacious garage. Well equipped for a long stay. Internet service is not the fastest, but was very reliable. If you're looking for a quiet home away from home, this is the perfect spot!

Great place! Clean, well organized and stocked with essentials, in a convenient location. We were passing through on our way home and stopped here. Lovely dinner in Fremont and an amazing accessible/inclusive playground in Fremont!
Great place to stay while I was visiting Fremont.
A very neat, clean, and welcoming small-town cottage with all the necessities and many thoughtful touches. Lots of games, 1 car garage….. Just like home!
Perfect place for me to stay while in town. It was great being able to have the garage.
Highly recommend this place. Everything was clean and well maintained, and there was even a book with things to do in the area.

This beautiful house is located in a small, yet peaceful neighborhood that is very close to the business end of Fremont where there is many places to eat and such. The house itself was stocked with various essential items in case something was forgotten which was great. The game room and the Roku TV in the living room provides guests with many ways of entertainment. The owners keep the house clean and tidy, ready for the next guests to arrive. All in all, this was a great airbnb and we will definitely be booking again in the future.
Perfect stay, no complaints. Beautiful location. House is cozy, we slept well. The kids loved the game area.
Very clean with wonderful accommodations for the whole family! We thoroughly enjoyed our stay at lovely Lindsey

Extremely kid-friendly!
Cindie provided a pack-n-play for our baby to sleep in. She also asked us, ahead of time, what room we wanted it set up in. The house also had child protected outlets.
Nice place with everything you will need for your stay
Adorable and clean house! We will be coming back again!

Fantastic host! Very flexible. Great communication.
House was great! Clean and updated. Nice, quiet neighborhood.
Provided pack n play for our baby and plugs were baby-proofed.
Had an amazing time. Love the games and the quite area. Overall a fantastic place to stay!!!
Very nice place to stay! Very clean, well maintained, and had all the necessary requirements! Loved the games and different coffee cups! Host is super helpful and nice!

This is a great place to stay. We stayed here during our daughters dance competition. The house was clean and very nice. Lots of space and fun games for kids. This was the first time we’ve stayed in an Airbnb and it was a great experience.
It was a great place for my daughters and I to relax for a few days. We loved the quiet town and friendly neighbors. The bike rides were out favorite part. Plus the game room was a lot of fun for us!

The house was great for the weekend. The space is much bigger than the pictures make it seem. The house is stocked with everything you would need, and Cindie even had the fridge stocked with waters. I would absolutely recommend if you’re in the area!
Stayed here after a wedding at old zims wagon shed, it was close to the venue and nice and clean too!
Wonderful stay at a reasonable price. Quiet area, comfortable stay. Thank you!!!

Cindie's place was amazing and exactly as described. She was very responsive and helpful with both check in and out. I especially appreciated the ability to park my car in the garage and would have enjoyed taking the provided bikes out for a ride if we'd spent a bit more time at her place. The neighborhood is very quiet but only a short drive from Toledo which provides plenty of options for food and fun.
As advertised and a great place to stay the weekend.

Cindie has provided everything you could want in a small vacation home plus some extras like the game room. Her high cleanliness standards are very apparent and the space is very much like the photos convey. Great place to stay - will not disappoint.
The host was excellent. Great communication. The town is so quiet and quaint. Had great games to play. New furniture and towels, easy smart tv, even single speed cruiser bicycles to ride around town!
Extremely clean and comfortable! Cindie, Mark, and the community are all so kind. Both hosts are very helpful and easy to communicate with whenever needed. Would absolutely stay here again!
Cindie was great and so was the space. It had everything needed, our stay was not very long but she was very accommodating and allowed us to check in early!
This is an immaculate two-bedroom home with garage in a lovely small, quiet village on the North Coast bike trail. Well-appointed with everything you’d expect at home. We’ll be back!
great place to stay. very cute and smelled amazing the minute you walked in.

The place was as described and the area was very quiet which I appreciated. Entry was simple using the recommended app on my phone. Easy to get from the house to the highway, and about a 30 minute drive on quiet rural roads through farm country to the famous Magee Marsh boardwalk for birding. A good deal overall.
This was our second stay in this home. It perfectly met our needs!

Very nice clean house. Beds and pillows were comfortable. Bathroom was stocked with towels etc (wash clothes in the sink vanity drawers).
Tomas's kitchen has coffee and the necessary utensils for cooking a good meal. We enjoyed our stay and hope to visit there again next spring.
Excellent spot to stay
Thank you so much for hosting us! Your home was so pleasant, clean, smelled great and very welcoming. Would absolutely stay here again if we were in town.
Great place

Was a great place to stay!! Was clean and relaxing place!! Will defiantly stay again if available. If you want a local close to places to go see and do, shopping this is your place. Was very quiet, something my mother and I enjoy after a long trip up to Fremont.

Lovely , clean property, very relaxing atmosphere. Lots of essentials and home comforts to help us get settled in quickly. Excellent value for money, responsive & friendly host. We stayed to enjoy the solar eclipse in Fremont and this property made the stay extra relaxing.
Wonderful gem of a house. Spacious and has everything you need. Great host, wished we had more time to enjoy the area, was just a one night stay. Would definitely recommend.
All household appliances worked well. Was clean and very nice for an older home. We would be very happy to come again.
It was great
Great house, very clean and the host was great to work with.

very friendly and the king suite is very comfortable.

Cyndi and Tim’s place make for a wonderful, restful stop for whatever reason you may have.

Thanks again Cyndi, we hope to be back soon!
